name: Yvie Enchanté: Special Delivery
description:
Notice: There is a bug in the mobile browser version where music does not play.

Yvie Enchanté: Special Delivery is a short prototype game with a focus on pixel art and character illustration, where you play as Yvie, the village witch, and help her complete her daily witch duties. You can explore and interact with the world around Yvie, and learn more about her and the villagers she helps care for.

Controls (PC/MOBILE):

Move - Arrow Keys/Left Click/Tap

Interact/Confirm - Spacebar/Left Click/Tap

Back/Return - Escape/Two Finger Tap
